text: Dance Teacher () is a 1952 Soviet drama movie directed by Tatyana Lukashevich.Учитель танцевУЧИТЕЛЬ ТАНЦЕВ It stars Vladimir Zeldin, Mark Pertsovskiy, and Tatyana Alekseeva. == Actors == * Vladimir Zeldin as Aldemaro * Mark Pertsovskiy as Belardo * Tatyana Alekseeva as Florela * Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya as Feliciana * Vladimir Blagoobrazov as Tebano * Mikhail Mayorov as Bandalino == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1952 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Tatyana Lukashevich
title: Dance Teacher (movie)
